src:
Teriak Pesawat Akan Jatuh, Penumpang Diturunkan di Tengah Jalan
05 Nov 2019, 05:30 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Foto: Ilustrasi Maskapai JetBlue (iStock)

Florida - Sebuah pesawat terbang melakukan pendaratan di luar rencana untuk menurunkan seorang penumpang yang histeris dan berteriak-teriak pesawat akan jatuh.Dilansir dari Fox News, kisah ini terjadi di sebuah penerbangan maskapai JetBlue rute Dominican Republic ke New York-JFK. Pesawat ini harus mengubah haluan ke Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood untuk menurunkan seorang penumpang.Penumpang itu sendiri dikabarkan berteriak mengatakan pesawat akan jatuh ke air. Kabarnya ia histeris setelah ia melihat sesuatu di monitor pesawat, walaupun tidak jelas apa yang dilihatnya."Kamu tidak percaya padaku? Pesawat akan jatuh. Percayalah, pesawat akan jatuh," teriak penumpang tersebut.Setelah mendarat di Fort Lauderdale, petugas mengawalnya keluar dari pesawat. Wanita ini lalu dibawa ke ruang evaluasi kesehatan mental. Belum diketahui dengan jelas apa hasil dari evaluasi ini.Disebutkan pula bahwa pesawat itu menghabiskan waktu sekitar satu jam di Fort Lauderdale sebelum kemudian lepas landas lagi untuk melanjutkan perjalanan ke tujuan sebenarnya di bandara JFK, New York.Simak Video "Duh! Ada Peringatan Badai Dorian, Pria Ini Malah Berenang di Laut"[Gambas:Video 20detik](elk/krs)
text:
Shouted Plane Will Fall, Passengers Dropped in the Middle of the Road
05 Nov 2019, 05:30 by Elmy Tasya Khairally


Photo: Illustration of JetBlue Airlines (iStock)

Florida - An airplane made a landing outside the plan to disembark a passenger who was hysterical and screaming the plane would fall. Reported from Fox News, this story happened on a JetBlue airline flight on the Dominican Republic route to New York-JFK. This plane must change course to Fort Lauderdale, Hollywood to drop off a passenger. The passenger himself reportedly shouted saying the plane would fall into the water. Reportedly he was hysterical after he saw something on the plane's monitor, although it was unclear what he saw. "You don't believe me? The plane will fall. Believe me, the plane will fall," the passenger shouted. After landing in Fort Lauderdale, officers escorted him out of the plane . This woman was then taken to the mental health evaluation room. It is not yet clear what the results of this evaluation are. It was also mentioned that the plane spent about an hour in Fort Lauderdale before taking off again to continue its journey to its true destination at JFK airport, New York. Watch Video "Duh! There is a Dorian Hurricane Warning , This Man Is Even Swimming In The Sea "[Gambas: Video 20sec] (elk / krs)
